text: I shall come back without fanfaronade%% Of wailing wind and graveyard panoply;
Of wailing wind and graveyard panoply; But, trembling, slip from cool Eternity-
But, trembling, slip from cool Eternity- A mild and most bewildered little shade.
A mild and most bewildered little shade. I shall not make sepulchral midnight raid,
I shall not make sepulchral midnight raid, But softly come where I had longed to be
But softly come where I had longed to be%% In April twilight's unsung melody,
In April twilight's unsung melody, And I, not you, shall be the one afraid.
And I, not you, shall be the one afraid. Strange, that from lovely dreamings of the dead
Strange, that from lovely dreamings of the dead%% I shall come back to you, who hurt me most.
I shall come back to you, who hurt me most. You may not feel my hand upon your head,
You may not feel my hand upon your head, I'll be so new and inexpert a ghost.
I'll be so new and inexpert a ghost. Perhaps you will not know that I am near-
Perhaps you will not know that I am near- And that will break my ghostly heart, my dear.
